assessment_item.title: LAAPAR-Q12-எதன் பற்றாக்குறையால் பழுப்பு மையக் கருக்கல் நோய் ஏற்படுகிறது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

எதன் பற்றாக்குறையால் பழுப்பு மையக் கருக்கல் நோய் ஏற்படுகிறது?     

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

இரும்பு 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1675"},{"text":"

போரான்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1676"},{"text":"

பொட்டாசியம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1686"},{"text":"

மாலிப்டினம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1691"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LAAPAR-Q12-எதன் பற்றாக்குறையால் பழுப்பு மையக் கருக்கல் நோய் ஏற்படுகிறது?","title":"LAAPAR-Q12-எதன் பற்றாக்குறையால் பழுப்பு மையக் கருக்கல் நோய் ஏற்படுகிறது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
